|vendor_id = 148f |device_id = 9097 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = ZTT-ACA1 |icid = 10233A-ACA1 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812AU; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/05/2013 |estreldate = 07/15/2013 |price = 89.99 |upc = 850214003485 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIA1PC48M2704 |asin = B00V5EO21S |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B00DKX0N9W |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "LPCY0009 V1.4" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The device is shown as using two '''SiGe''' RFIC (PA) modules
This device has a clip on the back and two RP-SMA connectors. :The design is quite similar to the [[Rosewill RNX-N2LX]] (another '''Loopcomm''' adapter).
*[http://ces.cnet.com/8301-34439_1-57563041/amped-wireless-intros-802.11ac-range-extender-usb-3.0-adapter/ ''High-res picture of the unit and surrounding area'' on '''C|Net'''] :The device is probably a [[Loopcomm LP-9097]] or a similar model. :Per '''Amped''''s driver set, this device has a USB ID of 148f:9097 :This would seem to indicate it is indeed a LP-9097
==Links of Interest== [http://www.ampedwireless.com/press/article.html?id=70 Press release]
